TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewPagedDataSource extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.ITypedList
Public Class ListViewPagedDataSource Implements ICollection, ITypedList
public ref class ListViewPagedDataSource : System::Collections::ICollection, System::ComponentModel::ITypedList
type ListViewPagedDataSource = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface ITypedList

summary.span: 封装 控件的与分页相关的属性。

span.span: Encapsulates the paging-related properties of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装使 控件能够执行分页的属性。The class encapsulates the properties that enable the control to perform paging. 此类使用最佳的可用方法来枚举关联的数据。This class uses the best available method to enumerate the associated data. 如果基础数据源支持索引访问 (如 和 对象) ，则类将使用该访问权限。If the underlying data source supports indexed access (such as and objects), the class uses that access. 否则，类将使用由方法创建的枚举器 。Otherwise, the class uses the enumerator that is created by the method. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已启用基于服务器的分页。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether server-based paging is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了基于服务器的分页，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if server-based paging is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定是否启用基于服务器的分页。Use the property to specify whether server-based paging is enabled. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则数据源对象执行基于服务器的分页。If this property is set to `true`, the data source object performs server-based paging. 否则， 控件执行基于 UI 的分页。Otherwise, the control does UI-based paging. 在基于 UI 的分页中， 控件请求数据源中的所有记录，并且仅为当前页使用它们。In UI-based paging, the control requests all the records from the data source and uses only the ones for the current page.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array array, int index);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (array As Array, index As Integer)
public: virtual void CopyTo(Array ^ array, int index);
abstract member CopyTo : Array * int -> unit override this.CopyTo : Array * int -> unit

param.name: array
param.span: 从零开始的 对象，它接收来自数据源的复制项。

span.span: A zero-based object that receives the copied items from the data source.

param.name: index
param.span: 指定的 对象中接收复制内容的第一个位置。

span.span: The first position in the specified object to receive the copied contents.

summary.span: 从 中的指定索引位置开始，将数据源中的所有项复制到指定的 对象。

span.span: Copies all the items from the data source to the specified object, starting at the specified index in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以 从指定的索引处开始，将数据源的内容复制到指定的对象中。Use this method to copy the contents of the data source into the specified object, starting at the specified index. 对象通常用于循环访问数据源中的项。The object is often used to iterate through the items in the data source.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取要从数据源使用的当前页的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items that will be used from the data source for the current page.

value.span: 要从数据源使用的当前页的项数。

span.span: The number of items that will be used from the data source for the current page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定将从数据源使用的项数。Use the property to determine the number of items that will be used from the data source. 返回的值取决于以下条件：The value returned is determined by the following criteria: - 如果当前页不是最后一页，并且 属性设置为大于或等于0的值，则 返回属性的值。If the current page is not the last page and the property is set to a value that is greater than or equal to 0, the value of the property is returned. - 如果当前页不是最后一页，并且 属性设置为小于0的值，则在返回该属性的值之前将 从该属性的值中减去该属性的值 。If the current page is not the last page and the property is set to a value that is less than 0, the value of the property is subtracted from the value of the property before it is returned. - 如果当前页是最后一页，则属性的值将在 返回之前从属性的值中减去 。If the current page is the last page, the value of the property is subtracted from the value of the property before it is returned. - 如果 属性为 `null` ，则返回0。If the property is `null`, 0 is returned.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataSourceCount As Integer
public: property int DataSourceCount { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of items in the data source.
The number of items in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以确定数据源中的项数。Use the property to determine the number of items that are in the data source. 如果使用基于服务器的分页，则返回属性的值 ; 否则，返回数据源中的总项数。If server-based paging is used, the value of the property is returned; otherwise, the total number of items in the data source is returned. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性为 `null` ，则返回0。If the property is `null`, 0 is returned.

exception.span: 数据源对象不实现 接口。

span.span: The data source object does not implement the interface.

summary.span: 返回一个实现 的对象，该对象包含数据源中的所有项。

span.span: Returns an object that implements and that contains all items in the data source.

returns.span: 包含数据源中所有项的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains all items in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可获取一个 对象，该对象可用于访问数据源中的各个项。Use this method to get an object that you can use to access individual items in the data source. 若要访问枚举器中当前位置的项，请使用 属性。To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the property. 使用 方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 若要将枚举器移动到其原始位置，请使用 方法。To move the enumerator to its original position, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 当你首次获取枚举器时，或者当你调用 方法将枚举器移动到集合中的第一项时，必须调用 方法。When you first get the enumerator or when you call the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the method. 否则，由属性表示的项 是不确定的。Otherwise, the item that is represented by the property is undefined.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control
